about_story.title: Our Story
about_story.description: Founded in 2024, Contact360 started with a simple observation: B2B data was too expensive and too inaccurate. We built a proprietary engine that verifies data in real-time, ensuring you only pay for contacts that actually exist.

metadata.title: CFO Email List
metadata.description: Highly targeted CFO mailing list database

hero.title: CFO Email List
hero.description: The CFO Mailing List is a highly targeted business contact database that contains the names and emails of top level executives in companies. This list can be used for telemarketing, direct mail, email campaigns, or any other marketing campaign.

cfo_segmentation.title: Segment Your CFO List for Maximum ROI
cfo_segmentation.description: A generic list fails. Our platform allows you to slice and dice our CFO database using 50+ unique data points to ensure your message hits home.

cards.title: Company Revenue
cards.description: Target CFOs managing budgets from $10M to $10B+ with precision revenue filters.

cards.title: Geography
cards.description: Access verified financial leaders across US, EMEA, APAC, and 190+ countries.

cards.title: Industry Focus
cards.description: Filter by SaaS, Manufacturing, Healthcare, FinTech, and 140+ specific verticals.

cards.title: Company Size
cards.description: Reach CFOs at Fortune 500 enterprises or high-growth Series A startups.

cfo_benefits.title: Why target the Chief Financial Officer?
cfo_benefits.description: CFOs are the ultimate gatekeepers of corporate spend. Engaging them early with high-quality data is the fastest way to accelerate your enterprise sales cycle.

benefits.title: Decision Making Power
benefits.description: 92% of CFOs have the final sign-off on technology and service investments.

benefits.title: Direct Dial Availability
benefits.description: Our list includes 85% mobile phone coverage for high-priority CFO contacts.

benefits.title: Verified Monthly
benefits.description: Every CFO record is double-verified every 30 days to prevent data decay.

testimonials.quote: Their CFO list was the only one that didn't bounce. We saw a 14% response rate from Fortune 500 finance heads.
testimonials.author: James Miller

testimonials.quote: Targeting CFOs by revenue size changed our outbound game. Contact360's data is unmatched in the industry.
testimonials.author: Elena Rossi

testimonials.quote: Accurate direct dials for CFOs are usually a myth. Contact360 made it a reality for our team.
testimonials.author: David Kwong

cfo_data_quality.title: Unmatched CFO Data Quality
cfo_data_quality.description: The most comprehensive financial leader database in the industry.

cards.title: Avoid Spam Traps & Bounces
cards.description: Standard CFO lists are filled with old data. Because financial leadership turns over every 4.8 years on average, we verify our CFO list every 30 days. We remove retired executives and catch-all addresses that hurt your sender reputation.
cards.footer_text: Never buy a generic, stale CFO database again.

cards.title: Proprietary Enrichment
cards.description: We don't just give you an email. Every CFO contact comes enriched with their company's tech stack, recent funding news, and departmental headcount growth. This allows your sales team to open conversations with relevant financial insights.
cards.footer_text: Data enriched with 50+ unique firmographic signals.

cfo_faq.title: CFO Email List FAQs
cfo_faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our executive data sourcing.

faqs.question: How accurate is the CFO Email List?
faqs.answer: We guarantee a 95% deliverability rate on all our CFO records. Our database is double-verified through automated SMTP handshakes and manual research every 30 days to ensure you never waste credits on bounces.

faqs.question: What details are included in each CFO contact?
faqs.answer: Each record typically includes the full name, direct professional email, verified mobile or direct desk phone number, LinkedIn profile URL, company revenue, employee size, and primary industry.

faqs.question: Is the data GDPR and CCPA compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes. Contact360 sources data exclusively from public records and legitimate business registries. We adhere to all international data privacy laws, ensuring your outreach remains safe and compliant.

faqs.question: Can I filter the CFO list by specific company revenue?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Our advanced segmentation tools allow you to target CFOs based on 50+ data points, including company annual revenue (from $1M to $10B+), recent funding rounds, and current technology stack.

faqs.question: Do you offer sample data for the CFO list?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can sign up and access 50 free verified leads to test the accuracy of our data. No credit card is required to start your trial.

metadata.title: AI Email Writer
metadata.description: Turn cold leads into warm conversations with AI-powered email personalization

hero.title: Turn cold leads into warm conversations.
hero.subtitle: Hyper-Personalization AI
hero.description: Stop sending generic templates that get ignored. Our AI analyzes your prospect's LinkedIn profile, company news, and tech stack to craft hyper-relevant emails that actually get replies.

funnel_impact.title: The Compound Effect of AI Personalization
funnel_impact.description: It's not just about writing faster. It's about optimizing every step of your sales funnel. From the first send to the closed deal, AI improves every metric that matters.

steps.title: 99% Inbox Rate
steps.description: Unique, non-templated content bypasses spam filters that block generic blasts.

steps.title: 3x Response Rate
steps.description: Hyper-personalized hooks prove you've done your homework, earning replies.

steps.title: 2x Qualified Leads
steps.description: Relevant value props filter out tire-kickers and attract serious buyers.

steps.title: More Meetings
steps.description: Clear, context-aware Calls to Action make saying "yes" to a demo easy.

steps.title: Higher Revenue
steps.description: A predictable pipeline of warm leads directly translates to closed-won deals.

writer_workflow.title: Your new 3-step writing workflow
writer_workflow.description: From blank page to "Sent" in under 30 seconds.

steps.title: 1. Connect Context
steps.description: Open the extension on any LinkedIn profile or website. We automatically scrape relevant data.

steps.title: 2. Generate Draft
steps.description: Select a tone and value prop. Our AI generates a unique, researched message instantly.

steps.title: 3. Review & Send
steps.description: Make quick edits if needed, then sync directly to your CRM or send via Gmail/Outlook.

before_after_comparison.title: See the difference AI makes
before_after_comparison.description: Generic templates get ignored. Our AI reads the prospect's LinkedIn, company news, and website to write emails that look manually researched.

before.label: Without AI
before.content:
Hi {FirstName},

I hope you are doing well.

I would like to introduce our company and see if you have time for a quick chat about synergies.

Let me know when you are free.

after.label: With Contact360
after.content:
Hi Sarah,

Saw your post about expanding the sales team  congrats on the Series B!

Scaling typically breaks data processes. Since you're using Salesforce, our native integration can help your new reps ramp up 2x faster by auto-filling valid contact info.

Worth a 5 min chat?

writer_social_proof.title: Trusted by top performing revenue teams
writer_social_proof.description: Join 10,000+ sales professionals who have automated their outreach with Contact360.

testimonials.quote: I was skeptical about AI emails, but Contact360 proved me wrong. The personalization is scary good. I booked 4 demos in my first week.
testimonials.author: Marcus Chen

testimonials.quote: It captures our brand voice perfectly. We reduced our outreach time by 70% while actually increasing the quality of every email sent.
testimonials.author: Sarah Jenkins

testimonials.quote: The ability to pull recent news and weave it into the value prop is a game changer. It does the research I usually skip.
testimonials.author: David Okonjo

benefits.title: Kill Writer's Block Forever
benefits.description: Spend time closing, not staring at a blank cursor. Generate 50 personalized drafts in the time it takes to write one manually.

benefits.title: Psychological Tone Matching
benefits.description: Our AI analyzes the prospect's LinkedIn posts to detect their personality type and matches the email tone (Direct, Friendly, Analytical) accordingly.

benefits.title: Unique Content = Inbox
benefits.description: Spam filters block identical templates sent in bulk. AI ensures every single email is unique, boosting your deliverability and domain reputation.

faqs.question: Does this work in languages other than English?
faqs.answer: Yes! Contact360 supports over 25 languages including Spanish, French, German, and Portuguese. It automatically detects the prospect's profile language.

faqs.question: Will I get flagged for spam?
faqs.answer: No. Unlike other tools that blast identical templates, our AI generates unique content for every single email. This variability is key to maintaining high deliverability.

faqs.question: Can I use my own templates?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You can feed the AI your best performing value propositions and case studies. It will then weave them into the personalized context of the prospect.

faqs.question: Does it integrate with LinkedIn Sales Navigator?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Chrome Extension overlays directly on Sales Navigator, allowing you to generate messages without switching tabs.

hero.title: About Contact360
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to democratize B2B data accuracy.
hero.description: Contact360 is dedicated to providing accurate, verified B2B contact data to help businesses grow.

cards.title: Data Integrity
cards.description: We never scrape LinkedIn. Our data is ethically sourced and double-verified.

cards.title: Real-time Verification
cards.description: Our SMTP handshake protocol ensures 99% deliverability rates.

cards.title: Customer First
cards.description: We build tools that empower growth teams, not just databases.

about_story.title: Our Story
about_story.description: Founded in 2024, Contact360 started with a simple observation: B2B data was too expensive and too inaccurate. We built a proprietary engine that verifies data in real-time, ensuring you only pay for contacts that actually exist.

metadata.title: CFO Email List
metadata.description: Highly targeted CFO mailing list database

hero.title: CFO Email List
hero.description: The CFO Mailing List is a highly targeted business contact database that contains the names and emails of top level executives in companies. This list can be used for telemarketing, direct mail, email campaigns, or any other marketing campaign.

cfo_segmentation.title: Segment Your CFO List for Maximum ROI
cfo_segmentation.description: A generic list fails. Our platform allows you to slice and dice our CFO database using 50+ unique data points to ensure your message hits home.

cards.title: Company Revenue
cards.description: Target CFOs managing budgets from $10M to $10B+ with precision revenue filters.

cards.title: Geography
cards.description: Access verified financial leaders across US, EMEA, APAC, and 190+ countries.

cards.title: Industry Focus
cards.description: Filter by SaaS, Manufacturing, Healthcare, FinTech, and 140+ specific verticals.

cards.title: Company Size
cards.description: Reach CFOs at Fortune 500 enterprises or high-growth Series A startups.

cfo_benefits.title: Why target the Chief Financial Officer?
cfo_benefits.description: CFOs are the ultimate gatekeepers of corporate spend. Engaging them early with high-quality data is the fastest way to accelerate your enterprise sales cycle.

benefits.title: Decision Making Power
benefits.description: 92% of CFOs have the final sign-off on technology and service investments.

benefits.title: Direct Dial Availability
benefits.description: Our list includes 85% mobile phone coverage for high-priority CFO contacts.

benefits.title: Verified Monthly
benefits.description: Every CFO record is double-verified every 30 days to prevent data decay.

testimonials.quote: Their CFO list was the only one that didn't bounce. We saw a 14% response rate from Fortune 500 finance heads.
testimonials.author: James Miller

testimonials.quote: Targeting CFOs by revenue size changed our outbound game. Contact360's data is unmatched in the industry.
testimonials.author: Elena Rossi

testimonials.quote: Accurate direct dials for CFOs are usually a myth. Contact360 made it a reality for our team.
testimonials.author: David Kwong

cfo_data_quality.title: Unmatched CFO Data Quality
cfo_data_quality.description: The most comprehensive financial leader database in the industry.

cards.title: Avoid Spam Traps & Bounces
cards.description: Standard CFO lists are filled with old data. Because financial leadership turns over every 4.8 years on average, we verify our CFO list every 30 days. We remove retired executives and catch-all addresses that hurt your sender reputation.
cards.footer_text: Never buy a generic, stale CFO database again.

cards.title: Proprietary Enrichment
cards.description: We don't just give you an email. Every CFO contact comes enriched with their company's tech stack, recent funding news, and departmental headcount growth. This allows your sales team to open conversations with relevant financial insights.
cards.footer_text: Data enriched with 50+ unique firmographic signals.

cfo_faq.title: CFO Email List FAQs
cfo_faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our executive data sourcing.

faqs.question: How accurate is the CFO Email List?
faqs.answer: We guarantee a 95% deliverability rate on all our CFO records. Our database is double-verified through automated SMTP handshakes and manual research every 30 days to ensure you never waste credits on bounces.

faqs.question: What details are included in each CFO contact?
faqs.answer: Each record typically includes the full name, direct professional email, verified mobile or direct desk phone number, LinkedIn profile URL, company revenue, employee size, and primary industry.

faqs.question: Is the data GDPR and CCPA compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes. Contact360 sources data exclusively from public records and legitimate business registries. We adhere to all international data privacy laws, ensuring your outreach remains safe and compliant.

faqs.question: Can I filter the CFO list by specific company revenue?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Our advanced segmentation tools allow you to target CFOs based on 50+ data points, including company annual revenue (from $1M to $10B+), recent funding rounds, and current technology stack.

faqs.question: Do you offer sample data for the CFO list?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can sign up and access 50 free verified leads to test the accuracy of our data. No credit card is required to start your trial.

metadata.title: AI Email Writer
metadata.description: Turn cold leads into warm conversations with AI-powered email personalization

hero.title: Turn cold leads into warm conversations.
hero.subtitle: Hyper-Personalization AI
hero.description: Stop sending generic templates that get ignored. Our AI analyzes your prospect's LinkedIn profile, company news, and tech stack to craft hyper-relevant emails that actually get replies.

funnel_impact.title: The Compound Effect of AI Personalization
funnel_impact.description: It's not just about writing faster. It's about optimizing every step of your sales funnel. From the first send to the closed deal, AI improves every metric that matters.

steps.title: 99% Inbox Rate
steps.description: Unique, non-templated content bypasses spam filters that block generic blasts.

steps.title: 3x Response Rate
steps.description: Hyper-personalized hooks prove you've done your homework, earning replies.

steps.title: 2x Qualified Leads
steps.description: Relevant value props filter out tire-kickers and attract serious buyers.

steps.title: More Meetings
steps.description: Clear, context-aware Calls to Action make saying "yes" to a demo easy.

steps.title: Higher Revenue
steps.description: A predictable pipeline of warm leads directly translates to closed-won deals.

writer_workflow.title: Your new 3-step writing workflow
writer_workflow.description: From blank page to "Sent" in under 30 seconds.

steps.title: 1. Connect Context
steps.description: Open the extension on any LinkedIn profile or website. We automatically scrape relevant data.

steps.title: 2. Generate Draft
steps.description: Select a tone and value prop. Our AI generates a unique, researched message instantly.

steps.title: 3. Review & Send
steps.description: Make quick edits if needed, then sync directly to your CRM or send via Gmail/Outlook.

before_after_comparison.title: See the difference AI makes
before_after_comparison.description: Generic templates get ignored. Our AI reads the prospect's LinkedIn, company news, and website to write emails that look manually researched.

before.label: Without AI
before.content:
Hi {FirstName},

I hope you are doing well.

I would like to introduce our company and see if you have time for a quick chat about synergies.

Let me know when you are free.

after.label: With Contact360
after.content:
Hi Sarah,

Saw your post about expanding the sales team  congrats on the Series B!

Scaling typically breaks data processes. Since you're using Salesforce, our native integration can help your new reps ramp up 2x faster by auto-filling valid contact info.

Worth a 5 min chat?

writer_social_proof.title: Trusted by top performing revenue teams
writer_social_proof.description: Join 10,000+ sales professionals who have automated their outreach with Contact360.

testimonials.quote: I was skeptical about AI emails, but Contact360 proved me wrong. The personalization is scary good. I booked 4 demos in my first week.
testimonials.author: Marcus Chen

testimonials.quote: It captures our brand voice perfectly. We reduced our outreach time by 70% while actually increasing the quality of every email sent.
testimonials.author: Sarah Jenkins

testimonials.quote: The ability to pull recent news and weave it into the value prop is a game changer. It does the research I usually skip.
testimonials.author: David Okonjo

benefits.title: Kill Writer's Block Forever
benefits.description: Spend time closing, not staring at a blank cursor. Generate 50 personalized drafts in the time it takes to write one manually.

benefits.title: Psychological Tone Matching
benefits.description: Our AI analyzes the prospect's LinkedIn posts to detect their personality type and matches the email tone (Direct, Friendly, Analytical) accordingly.

benefits.title: Unique Content = Inbox
benefits.description: Spam filters block identical templates sent in bulk. AI ensures every single email is unique, boosting your deliverability and domain reputation.

faqs.question: Does this work in languages other than English?
faqs.answer: Yes! Contact360 supports over 25 languages including Spanish, French, German, and Portuguese. It automatically detects the prospect's profile language.

faqs.question: Will I get flagged for spam?
faqs.answer: No. Unlike other tools that blast identical templates, our AI generates unique content for every single email. This variability is key to maintaining high deliverability.

faqs.question: Can I use my own templates?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You can feed the AI your best performing value propositions and case studies. It will then weave them into the personalized context of the prospect.

faqs.question: Does it integrate with LinkedIn Sales Navigator?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Chrome Extension overlays directly on Sales Navigator, allowing you to generate messages without switching tabs.

cta_section.title: Ready to triple your reply rate?
cta_section.description: Join 10,000+ sales professionals using Contact360 to write better emails, faster. Start your 14-day free trial today.
